name: VRun
description: The addictive VRun runner game for Virtual Reality! This game was inspired by games like Temple Run, Subway Surf, etc. Can you beat the high score?! This game will make you sweat and will pump your heart rate to the roof!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 64 Processor: Core i5-4590 2.8GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 720 MB available space
